slogan: One Stop for all your Industrial needs
hero_main_message: Industrial supply and services hero spotlight
hero_tagline: Trusted partner delivering premium piping solutions across the GCC
core_heading: Built on Reliability, Quality & Long-Term Partnerships
who_we_are_p1: Gulf Pipe Supply & Services (GPSS) is a trusted trading and contracting company headquartered in the industrial hub of Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia.
who_we_are_p2: We specialize in delivering high-quality materials, reliable supply solutions, and technical support to the Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Electromechanical, Marine Engineering, and broader industrial sectors.
value_integrity_desc: Operate with transparency and earn trust through every engagement.
value_customerfocus_desc: Listen to client priorities and tailor sourcing that fits their timelines.
value_qualityexcellence_desc: Adhere to international standards and certify every shipment for compliance.
value_innovation_desc: Introduce smarter inventory programs and digital coordination to reduce downtime.
value_commitmenttotime_desc: Plan proactively so deliveries arrive when projects truly need them.
value_teamwork_desc: Empower multidisciplinary teams that move in sync with partners.
value_longtermrelationships_desc: Invest in partnerships that span multiple projects and generations.
overview_subtitle_1: Leading Supplier in the MENA Region
overview_p1: [cite_start]GPSS takes immense pleasure in introducing itself as a well established trading and contracting company located in the industrial city of Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia. [cite: 624]
overview_p2: [cite_start]We are one of the top suppliers of Al Jubail offering our services to the Oil, Gas, Petrochemical, Electro mechanical, marine engineering and associated engineering industries. [cite: 625]
overview_p3: [cite_start]GPSS has a team of qualified, well experienced technical staff who provide cost effective solutions to customers' needs, offering high standard material in the best possible time. [cite: 626, 627]
overview_p4: [cite_start]Our staff is always ready to cater to the specific needs of our customers by providing required technical guidance and economical solutions and also best after sales service. [cite: 628]
overview_p5: [cite_start]Today we also take pride in saying at GPSS we have not only maintained principles but also the trust of our clients by building a strong network of customer relationship. [cite: 629]
image_alt_inventory: Industrial pipes neatly stacked inside a Gulf Pipe warehouse
differentiator_1_desc: Access partner mills worldwide, maintain safety stock, and remove supply chain uncertainty.
differentiator_2_desc: Operate under ISO/API-aligned procedures with mill test certificates for every line item.
differentiator_3_desc: Provide technical specialists, responsive logistics, and real-time project updates.
vision_text: [cite_start]Cost effective supply and service solutions for the industry for the present and future. [cite: 632]
mission_text: [cite_start]To achieve total customer satisfaction by providing sincere and continuous services to their focused needs, to develop and maintain customer friendly solutions and to be a trustworthy business partner for mutual growth. [cite: 634]
metric_disclaimer: Metrics are illustrative and synthesized from general business context (MOCK DATA).
inventory_heading: Engineering-grade piping solutions for all industries.
inventory_p1: [cite_start]We supply a comprehensive range of Pipes, Flanges, Valves, Structural Material, Instrumentation, Gaskets, Fasteners, Spectacle Blinds, and Strainers. [cite: 608, 609, 610, 611, 612, 613, 614]
inventory_p2: [cite_start]Materials include Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Duplex, Super Duplex, Alloy Steel, Inconel, Monel, and Titanium. [cite: 615]
inventory_pipes_sub: Carbon & stainless steel piping for fabrication shops and industrial manufacturers.
inventory_fittings_sub: High‑integrity fittings qualified for refineries and process units.
inventory_flanges_sub: Flanges and valves serving power, utility, and desalination projects.
inventory_structural_sub: Structural steel and specials for pipe racks, skids, and construction support.
cs_pipes_list: [cite_start]Grades A/B, X42-X80. Seamless/Welded: SCH 10-XXS. Size Range: 1/2''-72''. [cite: 655, 656, 651, 652, 654]
team_quote: "Our commitment is to deliver quality and value, fostering long-term trust with every partner."
ceo_image_alt: Portrait of Mohammed Eid Rashid Al Khater, CEO of GPSS
